title: Streamer Attitude
situation: Hmm… What kind of energy to bring to your stream right now?
choiceA_text: Imma keep it chill for now.

situation: Your streamer buddy invites you to play a new co-op horror game..

choiceB_text: Play one of your favorite games.

situation: A sketchy brand you’ve never heard of before offers you a deal.

situation: Your Mom wants to call.. But you’re still streaming..

situation: Your fans are curious and wanna know more about you.

title: Rude to a Fan
